trait.name: Ice Walker
entries: The Lagombi is accustomed to moving through the frozen tundras, as such it ignores difficult terrain for snow, ice, and other cold weather effects.

trait.name: Slide
entries: The Lacombi's reflexes and agility allow it to move with a burst of speed. When it moves on its turn in combat, it can double its speed while traveling in a straight line. If the Lacombi runs into a creature after moving at least 20 feet the creature must make a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. The Lacombi cannot use this skill again until it moves 0 feet on one of its turns.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Lacombi makes two claw attacks or one snowball attack and one claw attack.

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 12 (2d8+3) slashing damage.

action.name: Giant Snowball
entries: Range Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 60/100 ft., one target. Hit 7 (1d10+1) bludgeoning damage plus 5 (1d10) cold damage.
